game.name: Soaked
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Soaked is a multiplayer physics sandbox where you fling frisbees, chuck water balloons, and push players to their doom. Join the playtest today!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Soaked is a multiplayer physics sandbox where you fling frisbees, chuck water balloons, and push players to their doom. Join the playtest today!
